daos

Class DAO<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • daos.DAO<E>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    bstDAOImpl

    public abstract class DAO<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract Data Access Object class which specifies the functionality required to interact with a data store and implemented in concrete subclasses

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      DAO()

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void add(E theData)
      Adds a new StudentMarks object to the linked list
      abstract void findData(int theData)
      Search for a StudentMarks object in the BST and if it is found, displays it
      abstract void loadFromFile(java.lang.String filename)
      Loads an information about the tasks in the linked list from a txt file in csv format
      abstract void removeData(int theData)
      Remove a StudentMarks from the BST on a given mark module value, if it exists
      abstract void writeToFile(java.lang.String filename)
      Writes the information about the tasks from the BST into a txt file in csv format

      • loadFromFile

        public abstract void loadFromFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Loads an information about the tasks in the linked list from a txt file in csv format
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the txt file the tasks are loaded from

      • writeToFile

        public abstract void writeToFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Writes the information about the tasks from the BST into a txt file in csv format
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file that the tasks from the linked list are going to be stored

      • add

        public abstract void add(E theData)
        Adds a new StudentMarks object to the linked list
        Parameters:
        theData - the StudentMarks object that is being added

      • findData

        public abstract void findData(int theData)
        Search for a StudentMarks object in the BST and if it is found, displays it
        Parameters:
        theData - the StudentMarks object that is being searched for

      • removeData

        public abstract void removeData(int theData)
        Remove a StudentMarks from the BST on a given mark module value, if it exists
        Parameters:
        theData - the StudentMarks object that is being removed
